channel.title: About on Zangwei
channel.description: Recent content in About on Zangwei

item.title: About Me
item.author: zhengzangw at gmail.com (Zangwei Zheng)
item.description: I am a Ph.D. student at NUS, advised by Asst. Prof. Yang You. I received my B.Sc. in Computer Science from Nanjing University in June 2021. I spent a year in iCyPy at UC Berkeley from Apr. 2020, supervised by Prof. Alberto L. Sangiovanni-Vincentelli and Dr. Xiangyu Yue.

item.title: Research Interest
item.author: zhengzangw at gmail.com (Zangwei Zheng)
item.description: My research interest lies on Artificial Intelligence (AI), High-Performance Computing (HPC) and Computer Vision (CV), with a particular focus on Large Batch Training and Domain Adaptation.

item.title: News
item.author: zhengzangw at gmail.com (Zangwei Zheng)
item.description: [2021.3] I will join HPC-AI @ NUS to start my Ph.D. degree under the supervision of Presidential Young Prof. Yang You! [2021.2] Got one co-first-authored paper accepted to CVPR'21. Thanks to all my collaborators!

item.title: Publications
item.author: zhengzangw at gmail.com (Zangwei Zheng)
item.description: Prototypical Cross-domain Self-supervised Learning for Few-shot Unsupervised Domain Adaptation CVPR'21 Xiangyu Yue*, Zangwei Zheng*, Shanghang Zhang, Yang Gao, Trevor Darrell, Kurt Keutzer, Alberto Sangiovanni-Vincentelli Scene-aware Learning Network for Radar Object Detection ICMR'21 Zangwei Zheng Xiangyu Yue, Kurt Keutzer, Alberto Sangiovanni Vincentelli

item.title: Selected Awards
item.author: zhengzangw at gmail.com (Zangwei Zheng)
item.description: 2021, Outstanding Graduates of Nanjing University 2020, Outstanding Student of Nanjing University [2018-2019], 2 times, National Elite Program First-Class Scholarship 2019, Zheng Gang Overseas Study Scholarship
